summaryInsights.title: Membership signal
summaryInsights.detail: Membership up ~2.1% QoQ with mix shifting to commercial PPO; spend lift outpacing member growth.

summaryInsights.title: Medical cost drivers
summaryInsights.detail: Oncology infusions (J-codes) and cardiac DRGs 291/292 are leading unit cost lift alongside specialty pharmacy.

summaryInsights.title: Provider concentration
summaryInsights.detail: Top 3 systems (Sutter, Stanford, UCSF) running 2-4% above contracted escalators; steerage leakage to out-of-network ambulatory surgery centers noted.

summaryInsights.title: Policy gap to address
summaryInsights.detail: Tighten cancer drug site-of-care and step-therapy rules; revisit supportive-care J-codes where prior auth waivers are driving overruns.
